name: leopard-tie-client
description: Extended TIE Client that accepts additional heustomaderseaders

scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:flow
scripts.lint:test: npm run lint && npm run test:coverage
scripts.build: npm run lint:test && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:watch: clear && rimraf dist/cjs && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel -w src --out-dir dist/cjs
scripts.build:es: rimraf dist/es && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir dist/es
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist/cjs && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir dist/cjs
scripts.build:umd: rimraf dist/umd && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es rollup -c & cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c

author: Peter Joles (jolzee@gmail.com)
